item.title: How to add Defence interface my way X)
item.dc:creator: @ltxwolf ltxwolf
item.description:
@ltxwolf wrote:

This is not Good so please dont say its crappy cuz i know it is. This is for the ones that want it.
Add this in “Client.java”

public void def() { sendQuest("@dre@Defence", 8144); sendQuest("", 8145); clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("@dre@Information", 8148); sendQuest("@dre@Name Level requierd", 8149); sendQuest("@dre@Bronze-Iron 1", 8150); sendQuest("@dre@Steel 5", 8151); sendQuest("@dre@Black 10", 8152); sendQuest("@dre@Mithril 20", 8153); sendQuest("@dre@Adamant 30", 8154); sendQuest("@dre@Rune 40", 8155); sendQuest("@dre@Dragon 60", 8156); sendQuest("@dre@Bandos 65", 8157); sendQuest("@dre@Barrows 70", 8158); sendQuest("@dre@Armadyl 70", 8159); sendQuest("@dre@Statius-Vesta 75", 8160); sendQuest("@dre@Morrigans 75", 8161); sendQuest("@dre@Zuriels 75", 8162); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }

And add this in “Clicking.java or what urs called buttons or w/e”

case 33212: c.def(); break;

:S it works for DELTAS
